Chapter.Name: DECLARATION OF DEATH OF MISSING PERSONS

ExternalData.Titlesect: Protocol for extending the period of validity of the Convention on the Declaration of Death of Missing Persons*

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 22 January 1957, in accordance with article III(a).

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 258, p. 392.

TreatyNote.Text: In accordance with article 17 (1), the Convention was to cease to have effect on 23 January 1957. However, the Convention was extended as a result of the adoption of the Protocols of 16 January 1957 and 15 January 1967, and remained in force until 24 January 1972.

Termination.Label: TERMINATION
Termination.Labeltext: of the Convention of 6 April 1950 (see chapter XV.1).

Treaty.Footer: XV 2. Declaration of Death of Missing Persons
